articles.author: ET Online
articles.title: Tata Sons will now have to put in lots more money into Air India - Economic Times
articles.description: A TOI report says it has already invested Rs 6000 in its existing airline startups , AirAsia India and Vistara, and lost over Rs 9,000 crore till date. Air India, which has not made a profit in the last 14 years, will add to that burden.
articles.content:
Tata Sons, which has taken over Air India with a Rs18,000 crore bid will have to spend more money-- which could work out to nearly the same amount -- to restructure the carrier.
A TOI report says it… [+1293 chars]

articles.title: French envoy to Australia claims officials lied to his face over sub deal, raised risk of confrontation in Asia - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: France’s ambassador to Australia says the deal raised the risk of confrontation in Asia, and has the EU nation turning to other “trusted partners in the region”, like NZ.
